summary: When a young woman is cruelly and indiscriminately attacked by a notorious gang led by the violent Trey, her little 16 year old sister Kayla wants revenge and will stop at nothing to get it... See full summary »
cast: Lily Loveless|Riann Steele|Aimée Kelly|Emma Hartley-Miller|Adelayo Adedayo|Varada Sethu|Richie Campbell|Katie Foster-Barnes|Ashley Walters|Leon Ajikawo|Michael Maris|Ashley Chin|Nish Nathwani|Candis Nergaard|David Nellist|Slaine Kelly|Lewis Manu|William Willoughby|Christos Lawton|Pritpal Takhar|Ifte Amed|Kal Aise|Michael Coleman|Ray Bullock Jnr|Effie Woods|Geoffrey Aymer|Lottie Lewis|Reece Lyle|Daniel Aka|Lloyd McDonald|Suzanne Dollins|Rochelle De-Terville|Nick Embassy|Tracey Greenwood|Matthew David Hearn|Dan Love|Matthew David McCarthy|Melissa Ricci|Santi Scinelli|Emeka Sesay|Marc Sutcliffe|Andrew Turner|Samuel Victor|Glenn Webster
title: Sket
